column2: Assess ease of opening pudding container in microgravity
column3: Crew member retrieves sealed pudding cup from stowage, opens it slowly in front of camera
column4: No free-floating blobs larger than 1 cm and crew rates opening difficulty <= 3 on 1–5 scale

column2: Evaluate spoon handling and portion control
column3: Crew scoops standard bites (approx. 5 g) and moves spoon from cup to mouth 10 times
column4: At least 9 of 10 spoon transfers successful without visible free-floating droplets

column2: Evaluate taste perception vs. Earth baseline
column3: Each crew member tastes three spoonfuls and rates flavor, sweetness, creaminess
column4: Average overall acceptance rating >= 4 on 1–5 scale

column2: Assess mouthfeel and texture perception in microgravity
column3: Crew takes two normal bites and one larger bite, focusing on texture and afterfeel
column4: Majority of crew describes texture as acceptable and controlled graininess

column2: Measure crumb and droplet behavior with toppings
column3: Crew applies topping, stirs gently for 30 s, then eats 5 bites
column4: No more than 3 particles larger than 2 mm observed floating after 60 s

column2: Assess packaging suitability for repeated small servings
column3: Crew opens pouch, dispenses 5 small servings over 30 min, resealing between servings
column4: No leaks detected and convenience rating >= 4 on 1–5 scale

column2: Evaluate compatibility with scheduled activities and workload
column3: Crew consumes pudding during a standard work block break (<=10 min)
column4: Pudding consumed within 10 min without delays in follow up tasks

column3: Crew eats 1 serving and reports satiety and thirst at 0, 30, and 90 minutes
column4: No significant digestive discomfort and average satiety rating >= 3 at 90 min

column2: Test cleaning effort and residue behavior
column3: Crew intentionally leaves minor residue in cup and on spoon, then follows standard cleaning protocol
column4: Cup and spoon visually clean within 3 min and standard resource usage

column2: Overall acceptability and menu inclusion decision
column3: Crew samples favorite flavor, completes global evaluation on taste, handling, messiness, mood effect
column4: Average global acceptability score >= 4 on 1–5 scale and majority prefers to keep pudding on menu
